{{also|juni|júní|jūni|jūnì}} ==Chichewa== ===Etymology=== From {{bor|ny|en|June}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{ny-IPA|Júni}} ===Proper noun=== {{ny-proper noun|head=Júni}} # [[June]] ====See also==== * {{list:Gregorian calendar months/ny}} ---- ==German== ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|Juno}} {{qualifier|almost exclusively in speech; in order to better distinguish from ''{{l|de|Juli}}''}} ===Etymology=== From the {{etyl|la|de}} {{m|la|([[mēnsis]]) [[Jūnius]]||[month] of June}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈjuːni/}} * {{audio|de|De-Juni.ogg|audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Junis|gen2=Juni|Junis}} # {{l|en|June}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(s)|s}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} {{topics|de|Months}} ---- ==Indonesian== {{wikipedia|lang=id}} ===Etymology=== From {{bor|id|nl|juni}}, from {{der|id|la|iūnius}}, the month of the goddess {{m|la|Iuno||Juno}}, perhaps from {{der|id|ine-pro|*yuwn̥kós}}, from {{der|id|ine-pro|*yew-||vital force, youthful vigor}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|id|/ˈd͡ʒu.ni/}} * {{hyphenation|id|Ju|ni}} ===Proper noun=== {{head|id|proper noun}} # [[June]] ====Alternative forms==== * {{l|ms|Jun}} {{q|standard Malay}} ====Coordinate terms==== {{Months in Indonesian}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:KBBI Daring}} [[Category:id:Gregorian calendar months]] ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/ˈjuːni/|/ˈʒuːni/}} ===Proper noun=== {{head|lb|proper noun|g=m}} # [[June]] ===See also=== * {{list:Gregorian calendar months/lb}} ---- ==Norwegian== ===Etymology=== From {{m|no|juni||June}}, partly as a translation of the English given name [[June]]. ===Proper noun=== {{head|no|proper noun}} # {{given name|no|female}}. ---- ==Swahili== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|sw|en|June}}. ===Proper noun=== {{head|sw|proper noun}} # [[June]] ====See also==== {{list:Gregorian calendar months/sw}}
